New Records: Harden passed Ray Allen for No. 2 spot on the NBA's career 3-point list with 2,874 made 3-pointers
Key Match Events: Harden's first-quarter 3-pointer that moved him past Allen came during a 10-3 run that gave the Clippers a 22-13 lead
The Clippers led 66-45 at halftime and weathered a late run when the Jazz pulled within seven points with 3:18 remaining
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers have a four-game winning streak in their new building
The Jazz are at the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday night. The Clippers host Golden State on Monday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivica Zubac had 22 points and 11 rebounds for Los Angeles
Mo Bamba made his Clippers debut after opening the season with a left knee soreness. He had nine points with eight rebounds in 15 minutes.
